channel.title: Remake of hybrid pvp
channel.description:
[shadow=red,left][i][s][u][size=18pt]THIS IS OWNER KEVIN'S SOURCE[/size][/u][/s][/i] [/shadow] Well i was just using hybrid pvp's source and so i just thought i need to code it. So i coded some stuff. Not lots of stuff.
Things i DID change:
::commands ::rules ::shops - new shops area new starting place thieving at skills - FINALLY gambling at home
Things i will do in the future
New home New commands Dungeoneering Construction skill and Bounty Hunter
~~~Pics~~
GAMBLING AT HOME [img]http://gyazo.com/fd91a725e5d35f2383aa317bcbcea19a[/img] http://gyazo.com/fd91a725e5d35f2383aa317bcbcea19a - TRY THIS SHOPS COMMAND [img]http://gyazo.com/046bbc24be92257a2ff6d78692db6150[/img] http://gyazo.com/046bbc24be92257a2ff6d78692db6150 - TRY THIS SHOPS [img]http://gyazo.com/e5e0a2ed29001c22f2d55630cd36fd59[/img] http://gyazo.com/e5e0a2ed29001c22f2d55630cd36fd59 - TRY THIS RULES [img]http://gyazo.com/a44d198c68d00e5ea17afe1194cac742[/img] http://gyazo.com/a44d198c68d00e5ea17afe1194cac742 - TRY THIS COMMANDS [img]http://gyazo.com/432b01489c9dfd8c93a7495589f1c35c[/img] http://gyazo.com/432b01489c9dfd8c93a7495589f1c35c - TRY THIS
CREDITS me - 10% - me for coding stuff hybrid pvp - 90% - for client and source

item.title: Remake of hybrid pvp
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Yes exactly!

When you first started programming. When you made your first class, were you or were not ecstatic? I do believe you would be. Everyone who first starts programming little or small the project may be is an accomplishment in their eyes.

You consider it leeching, the person may consider it a learning experience. ( while I do not personally support rsps for java programming training but still that’s their choice. )

Read full topic

item.title: Remake of hybrid pvp
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:443722”][quote author=eclipse rsps link=topic=546398.msg4005764#msg4005764 date=1338611364]
wow… a new ::commands command. FUCKING SWEET!
[/quote]calm down, you have no idea of the person’s real age, level of java programming, etc. If you wish to critique a development state what he could do different or ask how he plans to develop certain parts of it.

@ op good luck I guess. We all start somewhere. [/quote]
ohh, so im suppose to be simpathetic to those who download a source and say they remade it? oh i see now. Thanks for oppening my eyes on this one -_-

Read full topic

Well i was just using hybrid pvp’s source and so i just thought i need to code it.
